participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Energetic and adventurous, Jake loves to explore new things and express himself through creativity.
participant_1.background: i like donuts. my favorite band is the insane clown posse. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events. i play a lot of call of duty.

participant_2.name: Isabella
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate, Isabella enjoys cooking and has a great appreciation for art and history.
participant_2.background: i visit europe twice a year. i'm a descendant of christopher columbus. i love to cook paella. i've a weakness for fish and chips. i am an art major in college.
